uas.lntv.pacmangame.Maps

Class GameMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • uas.lntv.pacmangame.Maps.Map
      • uas.lntv.pacmangame.Maps.GameMap

  • public class GameMap
extends Map
    This class sets up a map for a game level. It implements some additional code for generating and collecting collectables

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameMap

        public GameMap(Assets assets,
               java.lang.String path,
               MapScreen screen)
        Does the same as the parent constructor. Additionally it generates collectables and provides a method to collect them.
        Parameters:
        assets - instance of the assets manager
        path - string value which contains the path to a tmx-map-file.
        screen - instance of a Screen which contains this map

    • Method Detail

      • getCollectedDots

        public static int getCollectedDots()

      • goldenRatio

        private static double goldenRatio(int items)
        This calculates the golden ratio based on the number of items
        Parameters:
        items - total number of items
        Returns:
        returns the golden ratio

      • getPercentage

        private static int[] getPercentage(int items)
        It calculates a percentage portion for each item based on the golden ration. (it wont amount to exactly 100% though) Any left over percentages will be distributed equally to every item
        Parameters:
        items - total number of items
        Returns:
        returns a list of percentages for each item

      • newItem

        private Tile.Item newItem(java.util.ArrayList<Tile.Item> existingItems)
        It will generate an array that represents a percentage cake that includes every item based on its specific priority From this array it will choose a random item.
        Returns:
        returns a random item based on percentage ( percentage is based on the golden ratio )

      • generateCollectables

        protected void generateCollectables(Tile.Item item,
                                    int amount)
        Generates all simple dots/score-points which can be collected by Pac-Man. (would also work for special items) It does this by iterating through the tile matrix and placing items by chance (default: 50% chance) until it reaches a total amount of items.
        Specified by:
        generateCollectables in class Map
        Parameters:
        amount - the total amount of Dots/Points generated on the map

      • collect

        public void collect(Tile tile)
        This will delete a collectable from the map and plays a sound additionally it will in increase Pac-Mans score value. If the collectable is a hunter item it will evolve Pac-Man to SuperPacMan and set the ghosts to a frightened state.
        Overrides:
        collect in class Map
        Parameters:
        tile - specify the tile from which you want to collect an item

      • countItems

        public int countItems()
        Counts the number of items that are placed on the map already. (no dots)
        Overrides:
        countItems in class Map
        Returns:
        number of buff items (0-4)

      • generateSpecialItem

        public void generateSpecialItem()
        This method looks for special Items on the map an will generate a new special item in a free slot. The selection of which item to generate will be decided via an algorithm which is loosely based on the golden ratio. if a certain item already exists the likelihood of it spawning will decrease further.
        Overrides:
        generateSpecialItem in class Map
